pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to Zillow Real Estate and Mortgage Data API // Zillow, an online real estate company, provides real estate and mortgage data for the United States through a REST API. The ZillowR package provides an R function for each API service, making it easy to make API calls and process the response into convenient, R-friendly data structures. See http://www.zillow.com/howto/api/APIOverview.htm for the Zillow API Documentation.
